description:
Shishigami escaped from a dozen officers, but he has become a wanted man in connection to the home invasion spree. With nowhere to go, Shishigami stays with Shion Watanabe, a classmate who has feelings for him. Meanwhile, Inuyashiki learns to use his robot abilities with Ando`s help. After seeing Shishigami`s mother publicly apologizing on TV, they worry what Shishigami might do next.
Source: amazon
